column1: {{quote|...in that hour he appeared as one of the Mighty of the West
column2: and fit to be the father of the kings of the Kings of Men...|{{UT|Tuor}}}}

column1: '''Mighty of the West''' was a title used once
column3: to refer to [[Tuor]] the son of [[Huor]]. Its exact meaning is ambiguous: it appears in a passage that discusses Tuor's relationship with his descendants
column5: and so we have treated it here as an epithet for that division of Mankind.

column4: though it seems unlikely that such a comparison would be made of a mortal Man.
